gurmukhi: bsuDrysxI Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ]Sbd dwhnI AMq qvn ky dIjIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm jwn ijX lIjIAih ]ho pRgt sBw ky mwNJ aucwrn kIjIAih ]1193]
transliteration: Basuddaresaniaadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Shabad Daahaniant Tavan Ke Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jia Leejeeaih|| Ho Pragad Sabhaa Ke Maanjh Ouchaaran Keejeeaih||1193||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vasundhreshani”, add the word “Daahni” and know all the names of Tupak in your mind.1193.

gurmukhi: bsuMDrysxI Awid aucrIAY ]mQxI AMq Sbd ko DrIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm lhIjY ]AiDk gunjnn sunq BnIjY ]1194]
transliteration: Basoundhresaniaadh Udareeai|| Mathanipad Ko Ant Dharijai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Laheejai|| Adhik Gounjanan Sounat Bhaneejai||1194||
translation: Saying the word “Vasundhreshani, add the word “mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak for talented people.1194.

gurmukhi: nrw AiDpxI Awid BixjY ]mQxI pd ko AMq DirjY ]sB sRI nwm qupk lhIAY ]pRgt su kib jn sunqy khIAY ]1195]
transliteration: Naraa Adhipaniaadh Bhanijai|| Mathanipad Ko Ant Dharijai|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Laheeai|| Pragad Su Kabi Jan Sounte Kaheeai||1195||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Naraadhipani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1195.

gurmukhi: mwnuKysxI Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ]AMqknI Sbdwid qvn ky dIjIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm cqur pihcwnIAY ]ho SMkw iqAwg aucrIAY SMk n mwnIAY ]1196]
transliteration: Maanoukhesaniaadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Antkanishabadaadh Tavan Ke Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Paihchaaniai|| Ho Shankaa Tiaag Udareeai Shank Na Maaneeai||1196||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Manusheshani”, utter the word “antakni” and recognize all the names Tupak without any doubt.1196.

gurmukhi: dysdysxI pd ko piRQm bKwnIAY ]AMq ArdnI Sbd qvn ko TwnIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm cqur lih lIjIAY ]ho kibqu kwb ky bIc aucwrn kIjIAY ]1197]
transliteration: Deseanipad Ko Pritham Bakhaaneeai|| Ant Ardanishabad Tavan Ko Thaaneeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Lah(i) Leejeeai|| Ho Kabit(u) Kaah Ke Beech Ouchaaran Keejeeai||1197||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Desh-Ishani”, add the word “ardani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak for using them in poetry.1197.

gurmukhi: jnpdysxI Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ]AMqXMqknI Sbd qvn ky dIjIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm jwn jIA lIjIAih ]ho chIAih Tvr jhwN su qhwN qy dIjIAih ]1198]
transliteration: Janapadesaniaadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Antyantakanishabad Tavan Ke Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jeea Leejeeaih|| Ho Chaheeah Thavar Jahoon Su Tahaan Te Deejeeaih||1198||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Janapaadeshni”, add the word “antyantakani” and know all the names of Tupak.1198.

gurmukhi: mwnvyNdRxI pd ko piRQm bKwnIAY ]AMqXMqknI pd ko bhur pRmwnIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm jwn iqh ic`q mih ]ho BUq Biv`K Bvwn iesI kr imqmih ]1199]
transliteration: Maanavendranipad Ko Pritham Bakhaaneeai|| Antyantkanipad Ko Bahur Pramaaneeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Tih Chitt Maih|| Ho Bhoot Bhavikkh Bhaavan Isikar Mitmaih||1199||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Maanavendrani”, utter the word “antyantakani” and know the names of Tupak for the present, past and future.1199.

gurmukhi: lokeyNdRxI Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ]qwky hrxI AMq Sbd ko dIjIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm jwn ijX lIjIAih ]ho rYn idvs sB muK qy BwKXo kIjIAih ]1200]
transliteration: Lokendraniaadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Take Harniant Shabad Ko Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jiya Leejeeaih|| Ho Rain Divas Sabh Moukh Te Bhaakhyo Keejeeaih||1200||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Lokendrani”, add the word ‘harni’ at the end and know all the names of Tupak in your mind for speaking them day and night.1200.

gurmukhi: lokrwjnI Awid Bix`jY ]ArxI Sbd AMq iqh id`jY ]skl qupk ky nwm lhIjY ]SwsqR isMmiRqn mwNJ khIjY ]1201]
transliteration: Lokraajaniaadh Bhanijjai|| Arnishabad Ant Tih Dijjai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Laheejai|| Shaastra Sinmritan Maanjh Kaheejai||1201||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Lokraajani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know the names of Tupak as spoken in Shastras and Smritis.1201.

gurmukhi: dysysnI rvxnI BwKo ]AMq AMqknI Sbdih rwKo ]skl qupk ky nwm lhIjY ]su kibjn ky sunq BnIjY ]1202]
transliteration: Deseaniravnanibhaakho|| Ant Antaknishabadaah(i) Raakho|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Laheejai|| Su Kabi-jan Ke Sounat Bhaneejai||1202||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Deseshani Ramanani”, add the word “antakani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1202.
